pullRequest.title: JBPM-9246: Ignore random WebSocketKieControllerRuleCapabilitiesIntegrationTest failing test
pullRequest.bodyText:
- Ignores the following two random failing tests
    WebSocketKieControllerRuleCapabilitiesIntegrationTest.testStartAndStopScann
    WebSocketKieControllerRuleCapabilitiesIntegrationTest.testScanNow

nodes.bodyText: The @ignore annotation takes a single String parameter. The rule of thumb is to put there a link to the Jira which explains why the test has been ignored and which should be ideally resolved by the author of the test.
